titles: A proclamation for taking the oath of allegiance. At Edinburgh, the second day of September, one thousand six hundred eighty nine years.
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, by order of Secret Council,
notes: List of Council members present follows title; oath of allegiance follows text.
Signed: Gilb. Eliot, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Loyalty oaths --  Scotland --  Early works to 1800.
